article_text:
Don’t have time to read the Washington Post or New York Times? Then get The Morning Bell, an early morning edition of the day’s most important political news, conservative commentary and original reporting from a team committed to following the truth no matter where it leads.

article_metadata.description: Government shouldn’t be trying to protect people from themselves. If individuals want to drink sugar-sweetened beverages, that’s their prerogative.

og.description: Government shouldn’t be trying to protect people from themselves. If individuals want to drink sugar-sweetened beverages, that’s their prerogative.
og.title: Sugar Consumption: A Taxable Sin?
